meanings.definition: A wide scarf worn around the neck, typically with a formal suit.
meanings.sent1: He wore a stylish ascot to the fancy dinner.
meanings.sent2: The gentleman's ascot matched his suit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The ascot looked like a colorful snake slithering around his neck.
meanings.sent4: Her ascot was a bold statement piece that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The soft silk of the ascot felt luxurious against his skin.

meanings.definition: A type of necktie with a wide, flat end.
meanings.sent1: The ascot added a touch of elegance to his outfit.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate patterns on his ascot.
meanings.sent3: The ascot seemed to have a life of its own, dancing in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: His ascot was a shield of confidence during the important presentation.
meanings.sent5: The ascot's vibrant colors brightened up his entire look.
